name: v0.0.5
body:
## What's Changed
* prebuilt: fix detection of darwin goos in repo rule by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/48


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/compare/v0.0.4...v0.0.5

name: v0.0.4
body:
## What's Changed
* oci: fix decoding of docker auth strings by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/44
* Prebuilt without Go toolchain by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/45
* S3 virtual hosted style by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/46
* Prepare v0.0.4 by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/47


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/compare/v0.0.3...v0.0.4

name: v0.0.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Support GCS as remote cache by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/42
* logging: write request URI to syslog in debug mode by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/41


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/compare/v0.0.2...v0.0.3

name: v0.0.2
body:
## What's Changed
* add support for remote execution APIs by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/34
* add config file to configure helper by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/33
* refactor existing helpers to use config by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/37
* oci: respect .tweag-credential-helper.json by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/38
* update all deps by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/32
* add more tests for docker hub and fix cloudflare R2 downloads by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/31
* ci: switch Google workload identity provider by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/30
* release fileperms by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/27
* README: link to BCR by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/28
* README: fix typos by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/29
* prepare v0.0.2 by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/39

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/compare/v0.0.1...v0.0.2

name: v0.0.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Add automated tests for S3 and GCS by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/1
* harden agent by setting umask 0700 by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/2
* implement idle shutdown and scheduled cache pruning by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/3
* github: check "/rate_limit" api endpoint for token expiration by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/4
* gazelle: ignore examples by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/6
* create release target by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/5
* Prebuilt release by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/9
* feat(docs): add authentication guides for GitHub, GCS and AWS S3 by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/10
* add support for Cloudflare R2 by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/11
* document security considerations by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/12
* add a license by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/13
* Plugin development documentation by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/14
* Support Windows by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/16
* prepare bcr release by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/15
* fix integration test on Windows by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/18
* OCI auth by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/19
* add custom prefix on fatal logging messages by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/20
* Update r2.md by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/23
* do_a_release: set exit code of git command on success and error by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/24
* document how to build the code and contribute by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/25
* MODULE.bazel: drop Bazelisk patch by @malt3 in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/26

## New Contributors
* @malt3 made their first contribution in https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tweag/credential-helper/commits/v0.0.1
